text:
XO Group | New York, NY ; Austin, TX | ONSITE We are responsible for www.theknot.com, mobile apps, www.thebump.com, www.thenest.com, a collection of lifestyle companies.

We are looking for application security engineers to join our security conscious team of software engineers on site in either New York or Austin.

Find the contact here http://static.xogrp.com/work/how_to_apply.html
